    public class ArticulationEditor
extends EditDialog<meico.mpm.elements.maps.data.ArticulationData>
    This class creates the editor dialog for MPM articulation elements.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt

        Parameters:
        map - the map that gets or holds the articulation element
        msm - the MSM to which the performance applies, so we can access noteIds

      • getMsmScores

        private java.util.ArrayList<nu.xom.Element> getMsmScores()
        This method finds the parts that this map applies to and collects their score elements. Be sure that this.map != null.
        Returns:
        a list of MSM score elements
